installDB

public static void installDB()
                      throws IOException
Installs new database and set proper structure. Login information must be stored in configuration propertis file. If db with configured name exists, it will be overwritten.

Throws:
IOException

convertDateToGmtString

public static String convertDateToGmtString(Date date)
Converts java Date to string using proper format and GMT timezone. Used for storing date into XML as a String.

Parameters:
date - Java date.
Returns:
Formated text date.

convertGmtStringToDate

public static Date convertGmtStringToDate(String gmtDateString)
                                   throws ParseException
Converts date from XML file, which is in gmt timezone and default format into java object.

Parameters:

Returns:
Date in GMT.
Throws:
ParseException
